page.title: 01BACKGROUND TO S.CROYDON
page.content: This Block is on the fringe of Gt.London and is a mixture of residential areas,open space,woodland and{commercial}premises.The Brighton Rd.and the main railway line from London to Brighton run through the western part of the Block and dominate the{transport}and commercial life of the area,the bulk of the shops being on or near Brighton Rd.In the eastern parts in particular are extensive woodlands and open space used for{ {recreation} e.g:Addington Hills,Coombe Woods and Heathfields. There is a considerable difference in{ {housing}types across the area,with the valley around the Brighton Rd.generally having smaller,older properties and the higher ground on either side having more expensive,larger houses.
